sentences.english: Actually some matters miss one time are doomed to make the best of a bad situation.
sentences.chinese: 其实有些事错过一次就注定将错就错。

sentences.english: Life is very short, I am willing to go along with you.
sentences.chinese: 一辈子很短，我愿意和你将错就错。
